TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IQueryAmbient

summary.span: 查询是否应将指定的属性视为当前范围中的环境属性。

span.span: Queries for whether a specified property should be treated as ambient in the current scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 环境属性机制的目的在于通过通知 XAML 对象编写器避免实例化某些对象，从而提高分析时间，这是因为已知这些对象适用于暂时的值并且在正常运行时不适用程序.The purpose of an ambient property mechanism is to improve parsing time by informing a XAML object writer to avoid instantiating certain objects, in cases where it is known that the objects are for values that are temporary and not useful for a typical run time application. 通常，属性 get 访问器的 XAML 查找或 XAML 处理需要实例化此类对象，以使用随时可用的值填充对象图表示形式。Normally, XAML lookups or XAML processing of a property get accessor would need to instantiate such objects to fill the object graph representation with ready-to-use values. 有一个成员： 。 has one member: . 是的并行机制。 is a parallel mechanism to . 是一种专用机制，可避免使用反射来确定信息，还可以操作 situationally （给定的对象可以选择报告`true` 或`false` ），而属性实质上是静态的分析）。 is the specialized mechanism that avoids using reflection to determine information, and can also act situationally (a given object could choose to report `true` or `false` for ), whereas the attribute is essentially static analysis). 是 XAML 对象编写器可以使用的常规机制，通常与专用 XAML 类型系统属性和关联。 is the general mechanism that can be used by XAML object writers and that typically correlates to the dedicated XAML type system properties and . ## IQueryAmbient 的 WPF 实现WPF Implementations of IQueryAmbient 在 WPF 中 ，用于资源字典查找过程。In WPF, is used for the resource dictionary lookup process. 查找进程获取整个 WPF `Resources`逻辑树中的连续值，一直到资源范围的根，直到找到一个键或确定该键不在作用域内。The lookup process gets successive `Resources` values throughout the WPF logical tree, working towards the root of the resource scope until either a key is found or the key is determined to not exist in scope. 通常情况下，需要每次实例化一次来接收结果。Normally, doing so would require instantiating a each time to receive the results. 将的`Resources`内容声明为环境， `Resources`只要存在，就会优化此查找过程。Declaring the contents of `Resources` as ambient so long as `Resources` exists optimizes this lookup process. 在 WPF 中，此接口在以下情况下实现：In WPF, this interface is implemented in the following cases: - 实现以返回`true`所有属性名称 （如果 它包含的现有），只要查询不是针对属性本身。 implements to return `true` for all property names if it contains an existing for , and so long as the query is not for the property itself. - 为其实现同一模式。 implements the same pattern for its . - 为其实现同一模式。 implements the same pattern for its . - 为其实现同一模式。 implements the same pattern for its . - 为其实现同一模式。 implements the same pattern for its . 它还将内容报告为环境， `false`但在查询自身时返回。It also reports content as ambient but returns `false` if querying for itself. - 在上述每种情况下，相关`Resources`属性（和）的特性为。In each of these cases, the relevant `Resources` property (and ) are attributed as . 典型的用法是查询属性，这些属性不是定义接口的对象的特性化属性。The typical usage is to query for the properties that are NOT the attributed properties of the object that defines the interface. 换句话说，只要存在资源字典以便在创建对象图时提供潜在的运行时间值，则除资源字典的属性容器之外的任何其他属性都可以被视为环境。In other words, so long as a resource dictionary exists in order to provide the potential run time value when the object graph is created, any other property besides the resource dictionary's property container can be treated as ambient.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsAmbientPropertyAvailable(string propertyName) cil managed
Public Function IsAmbientPropertyAvailable (propertyName As String) As Boolean

param.name: propertyName
param.span: 要检查其环境状态的属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the property to check for ambience state.

summary.span: 查询可否将指定的命名属性视为当前范围中的环境属性。

span.span: Queries for whether a specified named property can be considered ambient in the current scope.

returns.span: 如果所请求的属性可视为环境属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the requested property can be considered ambient; otherwise, .
